title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.1 - Filing of notice of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.1 - Filing of notice of appeal

State Regulations

Upon the taking of an appeal as provided by the Bingo

Licensing Law from any action or determination of the municipal governing body
denying, suspending or revoking a license, the party aggrieved shall file with
the municipal governing body an original and copy of a notice of appeal within
30 days of the action or determination appealed from. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4831.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
